lessons.japanese: 我々は水害の被害者に食物と衣類を支給した。
lessons.english: We provided the flood victims with food and clothing.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは洪水の被災者に食べ物と衣類を提供した。
lessons.english: We provided the flood victims with food and clothing.

lessons.japanese: その少年は衣類を残らず鞄に詰め込んだ。
lessons.english: The boy crammed all his clothes into the bag.

lessons.japanese: これらの衣類は１００％の羊毛でできています。
lessons.english: These garments are made of 100 percent wool.

lessons.japanese: このバッグには一週間分の衣類がじゅうぶん入る。
lessons.english: The bag will easily carry enough clothes for a week.

lessons.japanese: あなたの衣類などは来月、宅急便で送ります。
lessons.english: I'll send you your clothes and some other things next month by express delivery.

lessons.japanese: 貧乏な人々に食料と衣類を供給しなければならない。
lessons.english: We must provide food and clothes for the poor.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は数分前に衣類のアイロンがけを終えた。
lessons.english: She finished ironing the clothes a few minutes ago.

lessons.japanese: 彼は週末旅行に間に合う程度の衣類を持っていった。
lessons.english: He took adequate clothes for a weekend trip.

lessons.japanese: 冬がちかづいてきたので、暖かい衣類を買う時期だ。
lessons.english: With winter coming on, it's time to buy warm clothes.

lessons.japanese: 男性用の衣類はゆったりしている。
食料品と衣類の陳列台にある商品は非常に安かった。
lessons.english: Goods at the food and clothing stalls were very cheap.

lessons.japanese: 上着は、衣類の１つである。
lessons.english: A coat is an article of clothing.

lessons.japanese: 私は衣類は普通地元の店で買います。
lessons.english: I usually buy clothing at a local store.
